arr.title: Introduction
questions: How does introducing sophisticated characters and narratives contribute positively to creative direction and design processes?
What properties of narrative can be harnessed in design, and what is the relationship between narrative and the database?

arr.title: The origin of my interest towards narrative methods
“A Crack-Up at the Race Riots” against Lev Manovich’s Database and Narrative
“Palindromes” and “Storytelling” as contemporary examples of purposeful experimentation in film
